doc:
Josh Lucas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josh_Lucas 0 Joshua Lucas Easy Dent Maurer (born June 20, 1971), is an American actor. He has appeared in various films, including You Can Count on Me, A Beautiful Mind, Sweet Home Alabama, Hulk, Secondhand Lions, Stealth, An Unfinished Life, Glory Road, Poseidon, Management, Life as We Know It, The Lincoln Lawyer, J. Edgar, and Red Dog. His television roles include The Firm, The Mysteries of Laura, and Yellowstone. Joshua_Lucas_Easy_Dent_Maurer ( born June_20 , 1971 ) , is an_American_actor . He has_appeared in various_films , including You Can_Count on Me , A_Beautiful_Mind , Sweet_Home_Alabama , Hulk , Secondhand_Lions , Stealth , An_Unfinished_Life , Glory_Road , Poseidon , Management , Life as We Know It , The_Lincoln_Lawyer , J._Edgar , and Red_Dog . His_television_roles include The_Firm , The_Mysteries of Laura , and Yellowstone .
